properties.areaDesc: Washington, GA; Wilkinson, GA; Johnson, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 4:14AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...Forecast Flooding Changed from Minor to Moderate Severity for
the following rivers in Georgia...

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Oconee.
* Until further notice.
* At 4 AM Friday the stage was 13.0 feet...and rising.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 17 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage late this afternoon and
continue to rise to near 22.3 feet by Sunday early afternoon.
* At 23 feet...Moderate flooding continues. Portions of the Old
Balls Ferry Road leading to the boat ramp becomes flooded with a
foot of water or more.  The entire dirt parking lot near the boat
ramp is under three to five feet of water. Extensive flooding of
the woodlands near the river continues.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
